data

Class ClackData

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.ClackData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileClackData, MessageClackData

    public abstract class ClackData
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class that all ClackData classes will inherit from.
    Author:
    Derryk Taylor, Jay Donahue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClackData()
      This ClackData Default constructor initializes the username to ANON and the type to 0.
      ClackData(int type)
      This ClackData constructor initializes the username to ANON and the date to the date it is initialized on.
      ClackData(java.lang.String userName, int type)
      This ClackData constructor initializes the username and type to user-provided values and initializes the date to the date it is initialized on.

      • ClackData

        public ClackData(java.lang.String userName,
                 int type)

        Parameters:
        userName -
        type -

      • ClackData

        public ClackData(int type)
        This ClackData constructor initializes the username to ANON and the date to the date it is initialized on. It initializes the type to a user-provided value.
        Parameters:
        type -

      • ClackData

        public ClackData()
        This ClackData Default constructor initializes the username to ANON and the type to 0. It initializes the date to the date the constructor is called.

      • getData

        public abstract java.lang.Object getData(java.lang.String key)
